about.title: Who We Are
about.description1: : your direct gateway to the best products from China.
about.description2: We connect thousands of users with an endless supply of technology, home goods, fashion and much more, carefully selecting each item to ensure quality and competitive prices.
about.description3: Our mission: to democratize access to international products with a safe, fast and hassle-free shopping experience.
about.qualityBadge: Export Quality ‚Ä¢ Infinite Variety ‚Ä¢ Direct Prices

HowItWorks.title: HOW IT WORKS?
HowItWorks.step1Desc: Browse thousands of imported products from China. Find technology, home goods, fashion and more.
HowItWorks.step2Desc: Select your favorite items and add them to your shopping cart easily.
HowItWorks.step3Desc: Make your payment through our protected platform with multiple methods available.
HowItWorks.step4Desc: We take care of the logistics so your products arrive safely at your door. It's that easy!

notFound.title: Sorry, page not found.
notFound.description: The page you are looking for seems to have been moved, deleted or does not exist.

informationWeCollect.title: 1. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We collect personal data during registration (name, email, date of birth, phone) and usage data related to streaming (watch history, preferences, device and network information).

howWeUseInformation.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
howWeUseInformation.content: Your data allows us to manage your account, personalise recommendations, improve streaming quality and send transactional communications (e.g., payment receipts, service updates). Marketing e-mails are strictly opt-in in line with GDPR.

subscriptionsBilling.title: 3. Subscriptions & Billing
subscriptionsBilling.contentContinued: ). Prices and renewal periods are shown on the purchase screen before payment. Subscriptions renew automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage or cancel your plan at any time via your App Store account settings. Restoring purchases is available with the "Restore Purchases" button in the app, as required by

sharingInformation.title: 4. Sharing Information
sharingInformation.content: We never sell your data. We only share information with trusted processors (e.g., payments, email/SMS/WhatsApp providers, analytics, hosting/CDN) under data processing agreements, or when legally required. We do not allow these providers to use your data for their own purposes.

processorsTransfers.title: 4.1. Processors and International Transfers
processorsTransfers.content: We may process data on infrastructure located outside your country. Where applicable, we rely on standard contractual clauses or equivalent safeguards to protect your information, and we assess our vendors‚Äô security and compliance posture regularly.

cookiesTechnologies.title: 5. Cookies & Similar Technologies
cookiesTechnologies.content: We use cookies and local storage to remember preferences and analyse platform usage. You may disable cookies in your browser; some features might not function properly. For EU users we display a cookie-consent banner in compliance with GDPR and ePrivacy directives.

dataSecurity.title: 6. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We employ encryption in transit (TLS 1.2+), hashed passwords (Argon2) and role-based access controls. Despite our efforts, no system is 100% secure.

yourRights.title: 7. Your Rights
yourRights.content: You may access, correct or delete your personal data, object to processing, or request data portability. Send your request to
yourRights.contentContinued: . We respond within 30 days as required by GDPR/CCPA.

childrensPrivacy.title: 8. Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: Mikiguiki is not directed to children under 13 years old. We do not knowingly collect data from minors. If you believe a child has provided us personal information, contact us and we will delete it immediately.

changesToPolicy.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changesToPolicy.content: We may update this policy to reflect new legal requirements or service changes. We will notify you in-app or by e-mail before significant changes take effect.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.address: Address (Ovalcampus USA): 1129 N Saint Lucas St Allentown, PA 18104, United States

deviceIds.title: 11. Device & Other IDs (Push)
deviceIds.content: We collect an installation identifier (e.g., push notification token) to enable push notifications and associate them with your account or device. We do not sell this data or use it for advertising. Data is encrypted in transit and retained only while your account remains active or until you disable notifications or delete your account.

authOtp.title: 12. Authentication and OTP
authOtp.content: For passwordless login and security verification, we may send one-time passcodes (OTP) via e-mail, SMS or WhatsApp to the contact details you provide. We share the necessary contact data with our messaging providers solely to deliver the OTP. These providers act as processors and may not use your data for their own purposes.

pushNotifications.title: 13. Push Notifications
pushNotifications.content: With your permission, we send push notifications about account activity, new releases and service updates. You can disable notifications at any time in your device settings or within the app. Disabling notifications may prevent us from delivering certain service messages.

dataDeletion.title: 14. Data Deletion and Account Management
dataDeletion.content: You can request deletion of your account and associated personal data using the following link:
dataDeletion.contentContinued: . Once we verify your request, we will delete or anonymise your data except where retention is required by law, dispute resolution or to enforce our terms.

dataRetention.title: 15. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain personal data only for as long as necessary to provide our services, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes and enforce agreements. Examples: (i) subscription and billing records for statutory periods; (ii) security logs for a limited time; (iii) push tokens while your account is active or until you revoke notifications.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.subtitle: Terms and conditions of use of the YuanCity platform (Ovalcampus) and EULA.

header.title: Terms and Conditions
header.description: Terms and conditions of use of the YuanCity platform (Ovalcampus) and EULA.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to YuanCity, an Ovalcampus platform for exploring catalogs, placing orders and purchasing imported products safely. By using our website or mobile application, you accept these Terms and Conditions of Use and the EULA. If you do not agree, do not use YuanCity.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.userDefinition: Person who creates an account or uses YuanCity.
definitions.providerDefinition: Entity that supplies imported products via YuanCity.
definitions.orderDefinition: Product request made by the User through the platform.
definitions.servicesDefinition: Features provided by YuanCity (product exploration, order management, payments, support, etc.).

registration.title: Registration and Account Security
points: You must provide truthful information and keep it updated.
You are responsible for your credentials and activity.
Over 18 years old or parental authorization in accordance with the law.
We may suspend/close accounts for breaches or fraud.

allowed.title: 4.1 Permitted use
points: Consult catalogs, availability and prices.
Place orders and make payments securely.
Receive order updates and support.

prohibited.title: 4.2 Prohibited use
points: Fraudulent orders or those that disrupt operations.
Access/interfere with unauthorized systems or data.
Post illegal, offensive or infringing content.

orders.title: Orders, Prices and Payments
points: Prices, availability and times depend on the Provider and import logistics.
Order is confirmed when processed; delivery times are estimated.
Payments with certified providers; import taxes/fees may apply.
Receipts/invoices according to applicable regulations.

cancellations.title: Cancellations and Refunds
points: Depend on the Provider and applicable law.
If the system cancels due to lack of stock or logistics, refund according to payment provider flow.
App Store/Google Play purchases are governed by their policies.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions and In-App Purchases (IAP)
subscriptions.content: If YuanCity offers subscriptions or IAP, you will see prices, benefits and periods before payment. Subscriptions may be auto-renewable unless canceled 24h before the end of the period. Management/cancellation from the corresponding store. Restore purchases will be available when applicable.
subscriptions.notResponsible: Apple and Google are not part of this contract between you and Ovalcampus regarding YuanCity; they are not responsible for support or service maintenance.

reviews.title: Ratings, Reviews and User Content
points: Content must be truthful, lawful and respectful.
You grant YuanCity a non-exclusive license to use/reproduce content on the platform.
We may moderate or remove content that violates these terms.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property and License
intellectualProperty.content: YuanCity, its software, trademarks, designs and contents are property of Ovalcampus or its licensors. You receive a limited, personal, non-exclusive and non-transferable license to use the app for the sole purpose of purchasing products according to these terms.

devices.title: Devices, Permissions and Third-Party Services
points: The app may request permissions (location, camera, notifications).
We integrate providers (payments, messaging, hosting, analytics) with their own terms.

warranties.title: Warranties and Limitation of Liability
points: Service "as is" and "as available".
We are not responsible for the final quality provided by the manufacturer or Provider beyond our platform guarantees.
Liability is limited to the amount paid in the claim transaction.

indemnity.title: Indemnity
indemnity.content: You agree to hold Ovalcampus/YuanCity harmless from third-party claims arising from improper use of the platform, breaches of these terms or violations of third-party rights.

suspension.title: Suspension and Termination
suspension.content: We may suspend or terminate access for serious breaches, fraud, security risks or legal requirements. You may stop using the service at any time.

law.title: Applicable Law and Dispute Resolution
law.content: These terms are governed by the laws of Colombia. Disputes will preferably be resolved by negotiation; otherwise, before the competent jurisdiction.

changes.title: Changes to these Terms/EULA
changes.content: We may update these Terms/EULA due to service changes or legal requirements. We will notify substantial changes in the app or by email. Check the "Last updated" date.

privacy.title: Privacy and Related Documents
privacy.content1: The use of the platform is also governed by our

description.title: What does deleting your account mean?
description.content: When you delete your account, your personal data, order history and preferences will be removed from our systems, except for certain minimal data that we must retain for legal or security reasons. This action cannot be undone.

warning.title: Warning
warning.description: Once the process is completed, your account and deletable data cannot be recovered.

verification.title: Quick verification
verification.emailHint: Must match the email registered in YuanCity.
verification.otpHint: We send it to you by email/SMS/WhatsApp if your account requires it.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: Questions before deleting your account? Write to us:

whatWillBeDeleted.title: What will be deleted
items: Profile and personal information (name, email, phone).
Order history, payments and preferences.
Favorite items and saved lists.
Subscription data managed by YuanCity (external subscriptions must be canceled separately).
Messages and communications linked to your account within the service.

fromApp.title: From the app
fromApp.description: Open YuanCity ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Account ‚Üí Delete account and follow the steps. Confirm your identity (PIN/biometrics/OTP).

byEmail.title: By email
byEmail.description: Send to contact@YuanCity.com with the subject ¬´Delete my account¬ª including your registered email and country.

verification.title: Verification and timing
verification.description: We may request additional verification. We process within 30 days. Backups may take up to 90 days to be purged.

dataRetention.title: Data that may be retained
dataRetention.note: The rest is securely deleted or anonymized.

items.label: Important:
items.description: Deleting your account does not automatically cancel subscriptions purchased in App Store or Google Play.
Cancel them directly from your corresponding store account.
We do not store complete card data in our systems.

status.success: Your account has been successfully deleted.
status.error: There was an error deleting your account. Please try again.

footer.content: For your security, we may request additional verification in some cases. If you need help, write to

modal.title: Confirmation required
modal.question: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account?
modal.note: We may request additional verification to protect your account.

Usage analysis to improve experience and performance.
Marketing with your consent (opt-in) and option to withdraw (opt-out).
